original_text:
There I will give her back her vineyards,
    and will make the Valley of Achor a door of hope.
There she will respond as in the days of her youth,
    as in the day she came up out of Egypt.
korean_text: 거기서 비로소 그의 포도원을 그에게 주고 아골 골짜기로 소망의 문을 삼아 주리니 그가 거기서 응대하기를 어렸을 때와 애굽 땅에서 올라오던 날과 같이 하리라

sentences.original_text: There I will give her back her vineyards
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그녀에게 그녀의 포도원을 되돌려 주리라

sentences.original_text: and will make the Valley of Achor a door of hope
There she will respond as in the days of her youth
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 그곳에서 그녀의 젊은 날들처럼 응답하리라

sentences.original_text: as in the day she came up out of Egypt
